# Glow Glucose

> A calm, supportive app for women managing gestational diabetes during pregnancy.

## About

Glow Glucose helps pregnant women track meals with AI-powered photo analysis, log blood sugar readings, and visualize glucose trends. The app is designed to reduce the stress of managing gestational diabetes with a peaceful, intuitive interface.

## Key Features

- **AI Meal Logging**: Snap a photo of your meal and get instant carb counts
- **Blood Sugar Tracking**: Log fasting, pre-meal, and post-meal glucose readings
- **Smart Reminders**: Never miss a reading with gentle notifications
- **Trends & Charts**: Understand your patterns with beautiful visualizations

## Status

Currently in development. Waitlist open for early access.
